website_summaries.verdict: A large laminated poster calendar that gives you the ability to look at a whole year in one glance.
pros: Can be used from year to year
Comes in several dimensions to fit your space
Easy to write on and wipe off
cons: Arrives rolled up and will need some flattening time before it will nicely lay on the wall

customer_reviews.title: Use wet erase... NOT dry erase !
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good calendar for the price. Yes, it is thin ... so I purchased a large picture frame and used mod podge to glue the calendar to the thin wood backing that came with the frame. Then i placed it back in the frame. (Without the glass of course). Now i have a hard surface to write on and it looks nice ! I got a pack of wet erase pens at Staples. Works great ...
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Mele

customer_reviews.title: Big ole calendar, that you can write and re-write one.
customer_reviews.text: My OCD is so happy right now; I can look at the whole year all at once. It just brings a tear to my eye. Writes well, I recommend SUPER fine tip Staedler wet-erase markers on these. Anything else will be a bit too thick and hard to read. Washes well, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great calendar.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a way to keep up with the big picture at my church. Now everyone can write in each group's events, and there won't be over booking of rooms. It hangs on a wall in our office hallway and everyone loves it. There are four grommets for fixing it to the wall. They're sturdy. The calendar is fully laminated, so we use wet-erase markers. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: BethanyD

customer_reviews.title: Waist of time.
customer_reviews.text: Do not order this! Arrived crushed and was crappy to begin with. Never would UNROLL even after extreme efforts. Ended up ordering a nice one from a local sign making company. Should've gone there to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Justin McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: broken in under two minutes
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to hang this on the wall and the grommets tore out instantly. I cannot use it and now cannot return it for breaking as soon as I tried. Why can I not return it, because amazon said it has flammable materials inside and is not eligible for a return I cannot recommend this as excited as I was that it would work and be a good purchase. It seems I am not destined to have a wall calendar. Invested in a kickstarter for something similar and they took the money without delivering the product and now this unfortunate experience.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: What I like: it's horizontal on one side and vertical on the other, so I have flexibility on how I use it. It's blank so I can fill it in however I like (i.e. start with July instead of January). It comes with a small marker which made it easy to add the dates. What I dislike: the material is pretty thin. Even though it came rolled up and packaged in a box, there was a crimp in the middle of the calendar (as though it had been bent while rolled up). That means there is a permanent wrinkle across the whole calendar. It looks kind of shoddy.
customer_reviews.author: rubysue

customer_reviews.title: What can I say five stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I expected this could it get any more perfect they did a good job with this piece
customer_reviews.author: nickolas86

customer_reviews.title: Huge and Helpful, Always Use Wet Erase Markers and Its Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It's a huge calendar and it's amazing to see the whole year out. School vacation times, camping, work schedules, special events. We use it for everything. I love being able to go to this calendar and just see when something month's from now is happening. It's not adhesive you have to nail or pin it up. It is double sided, I like the short and wide side, it's easier for me to write in all the days. I've never had a problem with easing the marker off because we us Wet Erase Markers Only. It's an important tip. It's perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mama & Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Good in theory but not in execution
customer_reviews.text: The spaces to write in are so small that I had to buy 3 different markers, then even with the most fine tip dry erase markers it is difficult to write legibly. It would be better if each block had no lines - then you could just freehand notes. Also, once you've written in the dates, if your hand touches them while writing notes on a date it wipes off the date. So constantly have to rewrite the dates/notes unless you are able to write keeping your hand off the calendar!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Light weight; good for multiple years
customer_reviews.text: This is handy because it is very lightweight and easy to hang and because the months are not pre-printed, you can always have a rolling year listed. On the down side, while this is quite big, if there are several things scheduled for each day it may be a bit hard to read from a distance because the space for each day is relatively small. It was a good value for the money and will work okay for our office.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT ERASE AS STATED IN PRODUCT DESCRIPTION!
customer_reviews.text: The description says, "Extra Large REUSABLE calendar 24x36 inches - Our laminated blank dry erase yearly calendars are ideal for project or event planning..." This sounded like exactly what I wanted, so I ordered it and used DRY erase markers. When I tried to move some activities and dates, it wouldn't erase - AT ALL. Then I came back to the product description, which does say, later on, that you should only use WET erase markers on it.
customer_reviews.author: HayAnne

customer_reviews.title: More than one year for 1/2 hour / year
customer_reviews.text: I like to permanently mount - framed, so being able to use more than one year is great. Big enough to track medical supplies and projected needs, but still fits on the wall. Liquid "Dry Erase" (AKA erasable chalk markers) are best for Month/ first/ last/ Sundays (won't wipe off, but water-removable), and dry-erase pens for notes.
customer_reviews.author: 2004done

customer_reviews.title: Got off black?
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this counter because I hate having buy an academic year wall calendar every year at the same time and it not be available. However the problem with this calendar is no matter what color marker you use it fades to this off black gray color therefore making it not very easy to organize items I’m putting on their
customer_reviews.author: Crys Curkendoll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great size! It will go perfectly on my office wall. I'd been wanting to buy an entire-year calendar and had looked at several different ones available. I chose this one because of the size of each square - plenty big enough to write in and see from my desk. And, unlike other calendars, this one isn't dated so it can be used year after year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need it to be.
customer_reviews.text: This is large and what I needed, however, the small squares for writing the date in are a tad too small. It will work though and is good as I don't ahve to bu another one each year.
customer_reviews.author: ABBRA

customer_reviews.title: Great for business planning!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! We are using it to plan out our upcoming business year. The spacing is sufficient for each day to write with a regular dry erase marker. My only complaint is that it is taking a long time to lay flat, as it was shipped rolled up. Other than that it’s a great product
customer_reviews.author: Molly P

customer_reviews.title: A YEAR AT A GLANCE
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is exactly what we wanted; however, for some reason we have had trouble getting an eraser for this type of item work on it, and we haven't gotten wet/dry paper towels to consistently work. Don't know why, but the calendar is serving its purpose anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality. The dry erase markers do not erase. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I knew this would be on the cheaper side for the price, but it is paper thin. I thought I would be able to hang it right away since there were metal grommets in the corners to put the tacks through; however as soon as I got the tacks in it ripped right through the grommets and the corners are now useless. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: sammie754

customer_reviews.title: great way to keep track of things over the year
customer_reviews.text: We have ours posted in the kitchen. It makes things easier to remember what's coming up or what has taken place in the year. I already had one in my office and thought it would be so helpful to have at the house. So needed in a house that is so busy!
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I needed a calendar that was big enough to see from across the room, undated so I wouldn't have to waste it year after year & split into quarters for planning purposes. This one hits all the marks for me. Thanks for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Ford

customer_reviews.title: Dual sided means it fits almost any wall
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product. The calendar is printed on both sides. One side is in portrait, the other side is in landscape. I have yet to find the perfect markers that work for this calendar, but I’ve been using post it notes with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: CajunDrawl

customer_reviews.title: Right choice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 10 for husband and I to do long term planning. Hopeful these work. Must lay flat with weight on top for days. Must user wet markers, surprised those using dry erase are upset since the description is pretty clear. I tested my wet erase and they work great
customer_reviews.author: Dave Berkey

customer_reviews.title: Really brilliant how they actually thought about the design and made ...
customer_reviews.text: Really brilliant how they actually thought about the design and made it two sided so even when you move apartments if you need to use it with a different orientation you can keep using it. Uber satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Justin W

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These will work, but they are so tightly rolled that the grommets pulled out IMMEDIATELY after nailing product to wall. They also came with some creases that will make writing a challenge. We ended up needing an entire pack of command strips to adhere them to a textured wall and the writing surface is still not optimal.
customer_reviews.author: Hire_ed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This calendar was exactly what I've been looking for for my office. It's big, but it works well. I love that I can reuse this. Tip: use wet erasers to write on this, not dry erasers. They don't show up well at all, very vague.
customer_reviews.author: BookAddict12

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't wipe off well.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using good quality erasable markers (which function perfectly on my white board) but there are random areas on this calendar which will not come clean with a wet rag. I've owned many white boards and some come clean and some don't, this don't.
customer_reviews.author: Hubstermeister

customer_reviews.title: I HATE THIS CALENDAR
customer_reviews.text: It came rolled up. Fast forward three weeks and it STILL WILL NOT SIT FLAT ON MY WALL. It makes writing on it an impossibility. I was HAPPY to throw it away. Two thumbs down. Ship it flat and we can talk.
customer_reviews.author: Jara Anton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have varied shifts and multiple outside activities. I hung this on the back of my laundry room door that exits to my garage. Now I am able to keep up and have a daily reminder as I leave the house. Great product and versatile. It can be hung vertically or horizontally.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Mc

customer_reviews.title: Life lesson - get a calendar
customer_reviews.text: I love that this calendar can be used horizontally or vertically. The days are a little small, and writing with the dry erase markers (especially on the wall) can get sloppy. But it's great if you made stickers and place on the appropriate day.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Zook

customer_reviews.title: This size works best
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for year long goals. I like how lightweight it is. Markers clean off with wet erase spray that you have to buy at a store.
customer_reviews.author: Public

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but reusable & customizable
customer_reviews.text: Enclosed marker works really well & easy to hang with the built in grommets. We used 3M Command hooks with the little metal hook attached & it's stayed up just fine. Perfect addition for our busy, deadline-oriented office! Not sure it needed to cost $70 though, seemed kind of excessive... $50 would have been acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: JulzRand

customer_reviews.title: "Free marker" is not included
customer_reviews.text: This laminated calendar is exactly as advertised, except that the wet erase marker was not in the package when I received it. It's okay, but pricey for what you get; and now I have to purchase markers in addition to the cost of the calendar.
customer_reviews.author: V. Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my schedule handy
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of craft fairs and festivals, as well as having an active personal life. These giant calendars keep my hectic schedule available at a glance.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Allan

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have a lot of court dates and visits and it helps me look into the future. Well worth the money. If I had to change one thing about the calendar it would be make the boxes a little bigger. BUT I AM VERY HAPPY WITH IT
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Borrego

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price (especially compared to the at-a-glance items). Be sure to buy the wet-erase markers (very important)! It has grommets in all 4 corners to prevent ripping and to allow you to place thumb tacks to secure to wall.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pond

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We'd searched for this item at different stores and were told that it's either discontinued or out-of-stock. It was so great that Amazon had this item available and at a good price. The calendar is perfect for our business planning purposes as dates for meetings and other are constantly changing and so with an erasable laminated calendar the revisions made are not as sloppy-looking.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Easy to write on. Had a lot of comments from those who saw it who asked where I got it. However, due to size/weight, it was a little difficult to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Ami M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: been looking for one like this for quite some time the fact that this is reversible and goes both directions horizontal and vertical is a major
customer_reviews.author: 10th Muse

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is so great to keep track of my hectic schedule. Its big and easy to read horizontally or vertically.
customer_reviews.author: Evrthng Zen

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep track of activities
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to keep track of reserved rooms at the office. I only wish the squares/space to write be bigger. But for the price, it will make do.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for yearly organization
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I travel a lot for work and have many project due dates...this will help keep me organized throughout the year.
customer_reviews.author: greenteaj

customer_reviews.title: Too busy
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good calendar for the price. I would have given the calendar 5 stars except I find the lines too small. The calendar would be more useful and a cleaner look if they would just remove the lines and only have blank boxes for each day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice to be able to do the whole year for ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice to be able to do the whole year for work. Love the lines in each square and the Note area at the bottom. Wish the squares were bigger-but then it wouldn't fit on our wall!!
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Small space to write. Cant fit stuff in. Get the bigger one.
customer_reviews.text: Boxes too small. Should have gotten the bigger one. If only one thing in a!space woyld be fine. Byut cant fit more than one assignment /birthday etc per day.
customer_reviews.author: Mestra

customer_reviews.title: Permanent Marker provided with Erasable Calendar...why??
customer_reviews.text: The marker provided with the calendar is a "permanent marker." It would better to provide a dry-erase marker with a erasable calendar..... I did not realize it was a permanent marker until I had to make updates on the calendar...used rubbing alcohol to remove the permanent marker.
customer_reviews.author: Henny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Good quality. I did have to put weights on it to uncurl it because it comes in a tube rolled up. But, that was no problem. I am pleased with the quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: Kathiejl

customer_reviews.title: My year on a wall
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous that this is undated. Plan to use for many years to come. And wet erase such a better deal than dry!
customer_reviews.author: Athena P.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Nice, But too the spaces are too small to be useful - I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: R.C. & N.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love being able to use year after year!
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is great, and fits right on my wall! I love being able to use this year after year! It is really convenient to write the months and dates by hand instead of buying a new one each year. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, free marker
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Received it, opened, it's in great shape and looks great. Nice big boxes to write in. Love that I can write on both sides. It even included a marker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says
customer_reviews.text: Great blank calendar, comes with a dry erase marker to write on it. Can be hung vertically or horizontally depending on the side you face out.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Dry erasable it's not!
customer_reviews.text: I received it promptly and used the marker sent with it and it works like a permanent marker on this board!! I am very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: David LaBonte

customer_reviews.title: No problem 1 month in
customer_reviews.text: When I got it rolled up, I laid it out for a day or 2, and had some help putting it up on the wall. I got the Vis-a-vis wet dry erase markers and they work great. Easy to write on, very clear, does not blot or drip, and does not smudge.
customer_reviews.author: EBV

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift for the boss
customer_reviews.text: nice and reusable! He loves keeping track of our assignments....more then we like it to be truthful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ah
customer_reviews.text: Hand smudges even chalk markers but esp wet and dry erase markers. Not user friendly for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: It's me

customer_reviews.title: Smaller days than expected
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, hard to gauge by measurements. If you want something to actually write several appointments on, this is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for planning your life over the year ...
customer_reviews.text: A must have for planning your life over the year...makes the time go so much quicker when you are in school ! :)
customer_reviews.author: Cher S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a complete 12-month overview
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size blocks to keep track of the year ahead. Unfortunately one of the markets included was broken, but that is minor still worth 5-stars
customer_reviews.author: Waste2water

customer_reviews.title: Nice calendar for our home
customer_reviews.text: For a large family like ours, it is nice to have a yearly calendar that is easily readable and can be reused each year. Lots of space for writing out everything going on in our year. Now if it just came with other colored wet erase markers that would make it even that much better!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Massey

customer_reviews.title: Works great in the office
customer_reviews.text: We use this often and it was easy to install. Writes on easy and easy to erase. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: MedZone

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Erase
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with this one, unless you have hand cleaner to clean it off. Otherwise will not erase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Classroom Addition!
customer_reviews.text: I just put this up in my classroom for the upcoming school year and I already love it! Great size!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Not cut straight
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done. My biggest complaint is it's not cut straight so it never looks straight on my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice for school
customer_reviews.text: Huge and very clear layout. I bought this for my student and she uses frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Cherlyn R

customer_reviews.title: Reusable is a plus
customer_reviews.text: This was what I was expecting when I ordered it. I like that it is reusable year to year. No frills, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: cassm

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and not at all what the photo looks like.
customer_reviews.author: terri p parker

customer_reviews.title: grommets were not attached
customer_reviews.text: product is just as described, minus 2 of 4 grommets being at the bottom of the package. Looks like they fell out. Not worth sending it back and waiting.......
customer_reviews.author: m mc

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and as described. Of course, because a whole year is in the space, the print is fairly small.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Fraze

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Space
customer_reviews.text: Great space for data; not so happy with brass grommets unless you have a helper to unroll and position it on the wall
customer_reviews.author: Scott Terry

customer_reviews.title: The boxes were too small to fill in the dates ...
customer_reviews.text: The boxes were too small to fill in the dates AND leave room for entries. Returned without a problem. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amber O

customer_reviews.title: Wall annual calendar eraseable
customer_reviews.text: This is working to organize the department schedule for this Advancement department well.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect size for us
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for months now with no issues. Works perfect for our needs, really love the size.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable dry erase calendar
customer_reviews.text: Daily notes space is a bit small but serves my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 12 month planner
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept but the laminated product retains such a memory that it wants to remain curled up...
customer_reviews.author: ou

customer_reviews.title: Nice calendar that you can use more than once
customer_reviews.text: Figured this would be a better purchase than a yearly wall calendar, since I can wipe it clean and re-use. It arrived in a tube mailer, which meant it curled quite a bit, but I rolled it the other way and placed it back in the tube for a few hours to try and straighten out the ends. Stuck it to the wall using some crafty tack, and haven't had any issues with it pulling away from the wall. The spaces are a little small for writing out detailed notes, but they're fine for jotting down holidays/birthdays and deadline reminders.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: The teacher we gave it to said it is exactly what she needed for the new project she is to teach.
customer_reviews.author: it's me

customer_reviews.title: Vacation Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work so everyone can put their vacation times on it. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Good Item
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, A large sized calendar to keep me organized.
customer_reviews.author: Slopopotomus

customer_reviews.title: Business approved
customer_reviews.text: Pretty large but gives me room to write more than one thing in each day. Great for businesses
customer_reviews.author: Tmoody

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for getting a visual look at my plans for the year and for working on with others.
customer_reviews.author: Jen A.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, as described and arrived on time. Perfect for my classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Brown Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this product and this seller
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and arrived very quickly. Would recommend this product and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, took for ever to get it to lay ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, took for ever to get it to lay flat. Ripped when I was putting it up. Still looks good on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: ttguitar

customer_reviews.title: Reusable, non standard calendars. Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It came with a marker so you can use it right away. I tucked mine under the carpet first to flatten it out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well on the office wall. It is a lifesaver for my spouse who travels constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Jili2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what the tax season ordered. Now I know how far behind I am! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift an they love it, it is very durable and practical.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie59

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It came all bent up...there are areas I can’t write on it because of the slight damage.
customer_reviews.author: CJHC

customer_reviews.title: I needed it latger
customer_reviews.text: The spaces to write in are too small to see from very far away. It is well made, but I needed something more readable.
customer_reviews.author: Counselor

customer_reviews.title: great wall calendar
customer_reviews.text: It could use a hanger or holes to hang it with
customer_reviews.author: Pam P

customer_reviews.title: It's a calendar! Hooray!
customer_reviews.text: We use this at my work to keep track of company goings on. It works very well and has been super useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Olson

customer_reviews.title: I am teacher who purchased one for each class I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am teacher who purchased one for each class I teach - they are exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't bad enough to go through the hassle of returning
customer_reviews.text: The far right side of this was wrinkled while it got laminated. It wasn't bad enough to go through the hassle of returning. It's true to size and we planned our whole year
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea P

customer_reviews.title: Could be thicker
customer_reviews.text: The size is great. Lots of room to put all 4 of our activities.
customer_reviews.author: Joy E Musser

customer_reviews.title: This wall calendar is perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: This wall calendar is perfect for our needs. It even included a dry erase marker which we didn’t expect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: WET ERASE is perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our office of five to track major events/advanced leave! Make sure you get WET ERASE markers as we didn't see that note and discovered it after the fact which delayed our using the calendar.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJune Cain

customer_reviews.title: good calendar, lousy packing
customer_reviews.text: product itself is fine, but the packing material they used bent it up resulting in many permanent crinkles in it. still useable, but not as nice as it could be.
customer_reviews.author: business manager

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using it at work- each color is a different staff person!
customer_reviews.author: S G.

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: I like te price ir the size. It is used to keep track f my husband's medical and treatment schedule. Cannot send picture HIPPA law. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Winnifred P.

product_meta.title: SwiftGlimpse 48" x 72" Large Jumbo Oversized Erasable Laminated Blank Annual Yearly Wall Calendar Poster, 12 Months, Reusable for Office, Academic or Home
product_meta.description: Size:48x72 HorizontalGet a huge jumbo picture glimpse of your entire year with the SwiftGlimpse Blank Yearly Wall Calendars. One huge poster displays all 12 months in one enormous view to keep you organized all year long. Huge blank months and blocks allow you to start the year at whatever month you wish and fill out the year as you see fit. Reusable year after year! Office, Home or Academic - the SwiftGlimpse yearly blank wall calendars will perfectly fit your planning needs! Track projects, schedule vacations or just look ahead. Each calendar is laminated on both sides with a durable 3mil lamination so you can easily write with wet erase markers and wipe clean with simply a damp cloth or towel. SwiftGlimpse wall calendars will give you plenty of space to jot down important notes and reminders for the year. Also included are large durable brass grommets along the top and bottom for quick and easy wall hanging. No need for messy tapes or foam adhesives that will damage wall. Hangs in seconds! NEW UPDATE: Extra Bonus! Each wall calendar is now printed on both sides so you can hang your calendar in either the vertical or horizontal position based on your wall space. You asked - and we listened! We thank our customer for the great ideas and ask they keep them coming so we can continue to make a better product year after year! Only the best from SwiftGlimpse - the industry leader in large wall calendars!
feature_bullets: ORGANIZE & PLAN AHEAD - Extra Large REUSABLE calendar 48x72 inches - Our laminated blank dry erase yearly calendars are ideal for project or event planning, team coordination or preparing your daily schedule, weekly deadlines, monthly due dates, and/or yearly goals. A perfect addition to your office, conference room or simply on any wall to help maximize efficiency.

REUSEABLE, ROLLABLE, REPOSITIONABLE - Start planning and don't have the stress of missing due dates or deadlines. Have your employees or team achieve goals in time without missing any projects or goals. Amazing tool for teachers as a project calendar and students to keep up with the academic school year for any semester or quarter.

WET Erase vs. Dry Erase Calendars: Why do we promote Wet Erase markers? Wet Erase most importantly will not ghost or stain! No matter what any company claims - dry erase can stain or "ghost" due to the acids in the inks. Wet Erase is also very durable, doesn't fade and will not wipe off accidentally by rubbing against it while writing in other date blocks. Extra SwiftCalendars wet-erase markers are sold on Amazon.
FREE BONUS: Reverse side now includes vertically printed calendar so your calendar can be hung vertically or horizontally! SwiftGlimpse wall calendars are proudly designed and printed in the USA!
EASY WALL HANGING - Brass Grommets included along the top and the bottom of each wall calendar or extremely quick and easy wall hanging. No muss - no fuss!
